meanings.definition: Relating to the evolutionary development of a group of organisms.
meanings.sent1: The phyletically distinct species showed unique characteristics.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the phyletically related species to understand their evolution.
meanings.sent3: The phyletically diverse animals had a party to celebrate their differences.
meanings.sent4: The phyletically connected branches of the tree of life intertwined beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The phyletically evolving species painted a vivid picture of nature's diversity.

meanings.definition: In a manner that pertains to the evolutionary relationships between different groups of organisms.
meanings.sent1: The species evolved phyletically over millions of years.
meanings.sent2: Researchers analyzed the data phyletically to trace the evolutionary paths.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped phyletically, discussing their family trees.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the evolutionary tree grew phyletically towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The DNA sequences unfolded phyletically, revealing the history of life on Earth.
